draw.template: Match between {{{ home }}} and {{{ visitor }}} ended {{{ home_score }}}-{{{ visitor_score }}}.
{{{ home }}} and {{{ visitor }}} finished their{{{ match_description }}} match in {{{ home_score }}}-{{{ visitor_score }}} draw.
{{{ home }}} and {{{ visitor }}} ended in draw {{{ home_score }}}-{{{ visitor_score }}} in their{{{ match_description }}} match.

win.template: Match between {{{ home }}} and {{{ visitor }}} ended {{{ home_score }}}-{{{ visitor_score }}}.
{{{ winner }}} won{{{ match_description }}} match against {{{ loser }}} with score {{{ winner_score }}}-{{{ loser_score }}}.
{{{ loser }}} was defeated {{{ winner_score }}}-{{{ loser_score }}} by {{{ winner }}} in their{{{ match_description }}} match today.

big_win.template: {{{ loser }}} was totally defeated by {{{ winner }}} with results {{{ loser_score }}}-{{{ winner_score }}}.
{{{ loser }}} was embarrassingly defeated {{{ winner_score }}}-{{{ loser_score }}} by {{{ winner }}} in their{{{ match_description }}} match today.
